factual: What are the conditions under which a juvenile between 14 and 16 years old may be required to undergo compulsory educational measures in the commune?
scenario_based: Suppose a 15-year-old commits a very serious crime, what kind of compulsory educational measures might they face according to this law?
advice_seeking: If I am under compulsory educational measures due to my actions as a juvenile, what steps can I take to demonstrate significant improvement and potentially have the measures terminated?
